note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
body:
### JellyJolly ###
是一个开源（GPL V3）的、Java编写的、运行在Tomcat服务器上的博客引擎。

### Openshift发布版 ###
运行在由红帽（Redhat）提供的PAAS平台Openshift之上，通过rhc命令行接口部署。

### 博客演示
[在线演示](http://jellyjollyteam.github.com/JellyJollyOpenshiftDistribution/)

### 部署JellyJolly到我的Openshift上 ###
详见[部署至Openshift](https://github.com/JellyJollyTeam/JellyJollyOpenshiftDistribution/wiki/%E9%83%A8%E7%BD%B2%E8%87%B3Openshift)

### 获取JellyJolly项目源码 ###
详见[参与项目的开发与扩展](https://github.com/JellyJollyTeam/JellyJollyOpenshiftDistribution/wiki/%E5%8F%82%E4%B8%8E%E9%A1%B9%E7%9B%AE%E7%9A%84%E5%BC%80%E5%8F%91%E4%B8%8E%E6%89%A9%E5%B1%95)

### 定制自己的JellyJolly发布版 ###
详见[定制](https://github.com/JellyJollyTeam/JellyJollyOpenshiftDistribution/wiki/%E5%AE%9A%E5%88%B6)
name: JellyJolly博客引擎 Openshift发布版
